entry_requirements_raw.SPM: Pass with minimum five (5) credits in Mathematics and two (2) science subjects.
entry_requirements_raw.O-Level: Pass with minimum five (5) Grade C in Mathematics and two (2) science subjects.
entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: Minimum 3 Grade B including Biology and 1 Science subject.
entry_requirements_raw.UEC: Minimum 5 credits (B6) including Mathematics and at least 2 Science subject.
